text.1: I am a front-end developer. My thing is designing clear, fast and durable web interfaces that clearly show what you do and why you should be trusted. I like to take your ideas and make them grow, so they become stronger, clearer and more impactful than you imagined.
text.2: I have already explored several areas: e-commerce, catering, CRM, SaaS... and I am eager to embark on new experiences.
text.3: I feel at home in the JavaScript ecosystem, but I also like to explore other technologies when the context requires it.
text.4: For me, each project is a unique adventure. If you want to bring an idea to life or create something new, let's talk about it!
